me masa 5wana iru dinata yedi thibunu haj uthsawaya nimiththen laba dimata niyamithawa thibu rajaye niwaduwa me masa 06 dinata laba dimata rajaya thiranaya karayi. kolambaa maha palliya wisin pasugiya masa 25 dinaye diwayine kisidu pradeshayaka purwa sanda nodutu bawa prakasha kirimath samanga rajaya wisin me masa (05) labadimata niyamithawa thibu adala niwaduwa thawath dinakin pasuwa me masa (06) labadimata niyamawi thibe.me nisa okthombar 6 dinaya rajaye wishesha banku niwadu dinayak bawa rajya paripalana ha swadesha katayuthu amathyanshaya danwa siti. 1971 anka 29 darana niwadu panathe 10 (1) (a) waganthiya ha 11(1) (a) waganthiyen rajya paripalana ha swadesha katayuthu amathi dabliw.di. je. senawirathna mahatha wetha labadi athi balathala anuwa me thiranaya gena atha.
